changes.change:
Starting with this beta release, all stock apps that have their own macOS icons
available in alt03b1's Big Sur theme will use the macOS icon.

Icons that have been changed:
• App Store
• Books
• Calculator
• Calendar
• Contacts
• Find My
• Home
• Mail
• Maps
• Messages
• Music
• News
• Photos
• Safari
• Settings
• Stocks
• TV
• Voice Memos

Icons that have been added:
• Feedback Assistant
• GitHub
• Google Chrome
• Google Maps
• Measure
• Notes
• Reddit
• Reminders
• Spotify for Artists
• Spotify Stations
• Spotify
• Twitter
• YouTube Music
• YouTube
